channel.title: Need epic help!
channel.description:
My server keeps connecting to Local Host and I need it to connect to my server ip, and I've gone through and changed every old server ip I could find and I changed the EGUI etc, and I still can only connect via Local Host. Any help?
This is the only thing stopping me from running my server I need help now!!
I'm using Googlescape.

item.title: Need epic help!
